name: Vein
description:
Your brother, a scoundrel, begged you to join him in the far north.
A mine there would make you both rich men, he said.
He went ahead. You should join him down below.

CW: Suicide

Audio Required
Headphones Suggested
All music royalty free

VA: Robert Polzin

Controls:
WASD
L-click to capture mouse
E to release mouse
